bug.author: amogkam
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
The Tune Logging page (<denchmark-link:https://docs.ray.io/en/master/tune/api_docs/logging.html>https://docs.ray.io/en/master/tune/api_docs/logging.html</denchmark-link> ) in the master docs still has references to which is now deprecated. This has led to some confusion with users <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/issues/9685>#9685</denchmark-link> . We need to update the docs to show proper logging using the functional API.

comments.comment: yeah this is good - can you push a fix?
